answers.answer: I failed the one hour but passed the 3 hour

It just depends on your weight and how your body processes sugar. I barely failed one hr then miserably failed the 3hr. I have gestational diabetes. Have to test blood sugar 4x a day. But its not that bad. Just have to watch my sugar intake will go away after baby. But my family has diabetes and i am currently overweight.

question: This is my second time taking the sugar test first came back a lil too high second test I will find out in 3 days.
